data.name: Politicians for Clip maker
data.detailed_description:
With Politicians DLC for Clip Maker you will get the following political characters for making excellent videos, films and clips:

Lukashenko
Trump
Xi Jinping
Jair M Bolsonaro

Those characters were created on request of our clients. You can also order a character created by your special request here

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
data.about_the_game:
With Politicians DLC for Clip Maker you will get the following political characters for making excellent videos, films and clips:

Those characters were created on request of our clients. You can also order a character created by your special request here

data.short_description: Politicians for clip maker. In just a few clicks you can create video clips, movies, animation, image art, visual novels, stories, manga, comics or just have a fun making characters behave as you would like.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
